title: Whiteout Survival Wiki - Chief Gear (upgrade cost table)
notes: Used to populate chief gear step costs.

title: whiteoutsurvival.app - War Academy Upgrade Cost Chart
notes: Used to populate War Academy FC step costs and prerequisites.

title: Troop Cost Calculator (training/promotion)
notes: Used to generate troop cost edges by sweeping troop_type, tier, and qty. Per-troop costs are linear (multiply by quantity for batch costs).

title: Building Upgrade Cost Calculator
notes: Used to generate building upgrade edges by sweeping building_id and level (L1-L30).

title: whiteoutsurvival.app - FC Building Upgrade Charts
notes: Used to populate FC level costs (30-1 through FC10-0) for 7 buildings: furnace, embassy, infantry_camp, lancer_camp, marksman_camp, command_center, infirmary.
